backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing dating profiles, matches, chat storage, and access‑controlled CRUD and query operations using Map stores.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files for build documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and scripts for entry-loader and the React app.
frontend/public/entry-loader.js: Pre-boot script that unregisters service workers, clears caches, blocks new registrations, and installs a boot watchdog.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, display mode, and installable icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with bilingual text, styled layout, and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker in temporary disable mode that clears caches, unregisters itself, and avoids intercepting fetch requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, routing between pages, and profile-loading logic.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation menu, language switcher, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: Error boundary component that catches fatal errors and shows a reload prompt with error details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown toggle for switching app language between English and Nepali.
frontend/src/components/OfflineState.tsx: Displays an offline warning message when the user has no internet connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, matches, messages, and actions like liking or sending messages through the actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements language state, persistence, and translation lookup for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines English UI text strings for the app, covering navigation, auth, onboarding, profiles, matches, chat, and install help.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and base UI behaviors like smoothing and safe-area padding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Implements the chat UI, loading messages, sending new messages, and rendering conversation threads with auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays swipe-style profile discovery with like/pass actions, loading states, and completion messaging.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelp.tsx: Renders install instructions for Android and iOS along with benefits of installing the app.
frontend/src/pages/Matches.tsx: Shows the user's matches with avatars and basic info, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile editor page that loads the caller’s dating profile, populates a form, and saves updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page showing language options, account info, and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Welcome/landing page displaying app features and providing a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and required PWA image assets.
